text: @HillaryClinton Hilary we cannot stay in our homes forever! We may never have a vaccine. Coronavirus has a 99.8% recovery rate you are being overly dramatic. It’s a risk to leave your house every day. Science says kids don’t spread the virus & don’t catch the virus easily.
